title: Greta Thunberg has taken President Trump’s advice, on Twitter
text:
After her impassioned plea for action against climate change at the United Nations, Greta Thunberg found herself the recipient of a review on style rather than substance from U.S. President Donald Trump, whose Twitter account characterized the Swedish teen thus:

‘She seems like a very happy young girl looking forward to a bright and wonderful future.’ President Trump, on Twitter

The tweet itself — widely viewed as oozing sarcasm and piggybacking on content from a Trump-atypical source: Wired magazine — did not tag Thunberg’s account:

She seems like a very happy young girl looking forward to a bright and wonderful future. So nice to see! https://t.co/1tQG6QcVKO — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) September 24, 2019

But, as if a tweeter-of-the-free-world magic wand had been waved, impact was swiftly achieved: Thunberg’s profile on the social-media network TWTR, -4.52% was describing her in just the sort of terms the official presidential statement seemed to have prescribed:
